```{r include = FALSE}
library(DataComputing)
library(lubridate)
```
<!-- put your content after this line -->

```{r}
companies <- c("JNJ", "PFE", "MRK")
Prices <- 
  read_stock_prices(companies, what="daily",
                  start_year=2000, end_year=2015)
```

```{r}
Prices %>% ggplot(aes(x=date , y=close , color = companies)) +geom_point(size=0.25 , show.legend = TRUE)

```

```{r}
myTable <- data.frame(action=c("buy" , "sell") , date = ymd(c("2004-10-28" , "2013-08-06")))

View(myTable)
```

```{r}
profitTable <- myTable %>% 
  inner_join(Prices)

```
